definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create

sentences.english: The three leading cores have developed the unique theory of party building.
sentences.chinese: 黨的三代領導核心形成了各自獨創性的黨風建設理論。

sentences.english: Zhengzhen made a lot of unique changes in the art manifestation of his poem.
sentences.chinese: 鄭珍山水詩在藝術表現上頗多獨創之處。

sentences.english: Specially designed computer-controlled system, facillitating the operation.
sentences.chinese: 採用獨創的微電腦控制系統，操作簡便。

sentences.english: The ingenious man received the prestigeous award for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 那位有獨創性的人首次接受這個具權威性的獎。

sentences.english: An innovative process-high gravity technology for nanometer material synthesis is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種獨創性的納米材料合成方法即超重力法。

sentences.english: Creativity is the same thing as originality.
sentences.chinese: 創造力和獨創性是同一件事。

sentences.english: Artistic originality turns out to be the murderer, to the fans' disgust.
sentences.chinese: 獨創的藝術成了令讀者反感的謀殺者。

sentences.english: Visual attribute is the self-creation of Chinese painting with the premise of personal originality.
sentences.chinese: 直觀的自我屬性是中國畫創作具有個人獨創性的前提。

sentences.english: Of stylist Promethean reflect so that make a person cry in this space absolutely.
sentences.chinese: 設計師的獨創性在這個空間中體現得令人叫絕。

sentences.english: LI Shangyin was one of the greatest poets with artistic creativity in the history of Chinese poetry.
sentences.chinese: 李商隱是中國詩歌史上最富藝術獨創性的大詩人之一。

sentences.english: Now it suggests care, leisure, individuality and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 現在這詞卻象徵着關愛，寫意，獨創以及美。

sentences.english: His playing as a trumpet player was quite revolutionary.
sentences.chinese: 他的小號演奏獨創一格。

sentences.english: Public surveillance was an original creation of China.
Piano piece "Prelude 6" belongs to his original song.
sentences.chinese: 鋼琴作品《前奏曲六首》屬於他的獨創曲。

sentences.english: The clay figure is a work of great originality.
sentences.chinese: 這尊泥人是頗具獨創性的作品。

sentences.english: The original creation is each one all is the wish, but has what kind of person to achieve?
